mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id, c.course_name, c.course_desc, t.teacher_id, t.teacher_name, t.teacher_desc, t.profile_img, c.course_size, c.create_time, c.last_edit_time FROM course c , teacher t WHERE c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id

SELECT c.course_id, c.course_name, c.course_desc, t.teacher_id, t.teacher_name, t.teacher_desc, t.profile_img, c.course_size, c.create_time, c.last_edit_time FROM course c , teacher t WHERE c.course_id = #{courseId} AND c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id

SELECT c.course_id, c.course_name, c.course_desc, t.teacher_id, t.teacher_name, t.teacher_desc, c.course_size, c.create_time, c.last_edit_time FROM course c , teacher t WHERE c.teacher_id = #{teacher.teacherId} AND c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course (course_id, course_name, course_desc, teacher_id, course_size, create_time) VALUES (#{courseId},#{courseName},#{courseDesc},#{teacher.teacherId},#{courseSize},#{createTime})
